reviewText: I bought this movie along time ago in VHS format, and now im looking for it on DVD, this is a wonderful yet TRUE movie on PT Barnums life, set back in time of his childhood, an old man becoming the greatest showmen on earth, this is a great movie !! Very much recommended !! a great history lesson in a movie not a documentary
This gentleman took life by the tails and lived it to the fullest.  Inspirational man.  This is a well done documentary.  Wish it were available on DVD.
